creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: book with woodblock printed images of leafy and flowering plants; crab; fruits; insects, and birds; some coloring; yellow cover with brown title label
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
text: Gift of James Cahill to Mary Burke on January 17, 1972.
title: Book of Pictures by Shazanrō (Shazanrō ehon 写山楼画本)
